duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure high quality standards at the Edwardsburg Sports Complex and adherence to preferred turf standards.
Supervise the installation and repair of the irrigation system.
Program the irrigation system and evaluate weather conditions and field use.
Train and evaluate volunteer mowing staff, handle fertilization, and weed control activities.
Inform the Complex Manager of all issues regarding facilities, turf management, irrigation, equipment, and volunteer staff.
Handle various matters involving contact with volunteers, board members, committees, and the public.
Perform miscellaneous Complex tasks as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School or equivalent. Past turf management and irrigation equipment experience is a plus.
